english.segment1: everytime I turn the TV on. see another pretty face on the screen. feels like I'm not good enough. to be on the cover of a magazine. turn around, I look in the mirror
english.segment2: and I wonder if ill ever measure up. all I want is someone to make it clearer. am I ever gonna find the perfect love?
english.segment3: then You break through the madness. and You tell me how it is.
english.segment4: (chorus). You're a diamond that shines. one of a kind. a shimmering radiant star. You're a flower in the rain. wonderfully made. to shine like the sun. You're a diamond
english.segment5: friends try and tell me just to loosen up a little. You're gonna scare the good ones away. get a look with a hook, its fundamental. come on girl, u gotta get into the game. something deep inside of me says
english.segment6: are u sure that u really want to play?. gotta trust ur heart and not ur head. instead of buying into the masquerade. I'm not some decoration. so would u tell me how it is.. (chorus)
english.segment7: doesn't matter if they tell u how to live
english.segment8: doesn't matter if they try and mold u. doesn't matter if they say what beautiful is. You're a diamond cause He already showed u
